title: New: dd elle – love me only
body:
**dd elle** is already one of my favourite emerging artists of 2014.

With each track released, they seem to capture more and more attention, and not only that, but appear to be chiselling out a sound entirely their own. Newest release _love me only_ has already received praise from numerous top respected blogs, and acts as a forward to the debut **dd elle** EP, expected later this year. Another slick of squelchy odd-pop, it’s unique in texture and composition. Check it out below.
